name: alphamountain
label: alphaMountain
description: alphaMountain Threat Response integrates investigations informed by reputation scores of target hosts, domains, and IP addresses. It fetches indicators with risk scores and relevant content categorization.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.description: Specify the Rest API endpoint URL of the alphaMountain server to connect and perform automated operations.
fields.tooltip: Specify the Rest API endpoint URL of the alphaMountain server to connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: API Key
fields.name: api_key
fields.tooltip: Specify the API key to access the alphaMountain Rest API endpoint to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.description: Specify the API key to access the alphaMountain Rest API endpoint to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified. By default, this option is set to True.
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified. By default, this option is set to True.

operations.title: Get Threat Score
operations.description: Retrieve threat rating scores stored in the alphaMountain.ai cloud for the provided URL or URI

parameters.title: Input Type
parameters.name: input_type
parameters.description: Select the input type to retrieve a single or multiple URL threat ratings stored in the alphaMountain.ai cloud

Specific URL.title: URL
Specific URL.name: url
Specific URL.description: Provide a specific URI or URL to retrieve threat ratings scores stored in the alphaMountain.ai cloud
Specific URL.tooltip: Provide a specific URI or URL to retrieve threat ratings scores stored in the alphaMountain.ai cloud

Specific URL.title: Scan Depth
Specific URL.name: scan_depth
Specific URL.description: Select the scan depth to determine how thorough a real-time lookup should be performed. Each level may take more time to respond
Specific URL.tooltip: Select the scan depth to determine how thorough a real-time lookup should be performed. Each level may take more time to respond

Multiple URLs.title: URLs
Multiple URLs.name: urls
Multiple URLs.description: Specify the CSV list of URLs or URLs to retrieve threat ratings scores stored in the alphaMountain.ai cloud
Multiple URLs.tooltip: Specify the CSV list of URLs or URLs to retrieve threat ratings scores stored in the alphaMountain.ai cloud

operations.title: Get URL Categories
operations.description: Fetch categories associated with an internet URL using alphaMountain's statistical and neural network models, validated across multiple sources. Note Category IDs are returned for performance reasons instead of textual category strings.

parameters.title: Input Type
parameters.name: input_type
parameters.description: Select the input type to retrieve a single or multiple URL categories stored in the alphaMountain.ai cloud

Specific URL.title: URL
Specific URL.name: url
Specific URL.description: Provide a specific URI or URL to categorize using alphaMountain.ai cloud
Specific URL.tooltip: Provide a specific URI or URL to categorize using alphaMountain.ai cloud

Multiple URLs.title: URLs
Multiple URLs.name: urls
Multiple URLs.description: Specify the CSV list of URLs or URLs to categorize using alphaMountain.ai cloud
Multiple URLs.tooltip: Specify the CSV list of URLs or URLs to categorize using alphaMountain.ai cloud
